DOCNAME: CASE OF ŠERIFOVIĆ AND OTHERS v. SERBIA
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Enforcement proceedings;Article 6-1 - Access to court);Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property (Article 1 para. 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Peaceful enjoyment of possessions)
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants were born in DATE , DATE and DATE , respectively , and live in ORG .
CARDINAL . They were employed by ORG “ Raška Holding Kompanija ” DATE , a socially - owned company based in ORG ( hereinafter “ the debtor ” ) .
A. ORG proceedings brought by the first applicant ( PERSON )

CARDINAL . On DATE , DATE and DATE respectively , ORG ordered the debtor to pay the first applicant specified amounts on account of salary arrears and social insurance contributions , plus the costs of the civil proceedings . These judgments became final on DATE , DATE and DATE respectively .

CARDINAL . On DATE , DATE and DATE respectively , upon the first applicant ’s request to that effect , ORG ordered the enforcement of the said judgments and further ordered the debtor to pay the first applicant the enforcement costs .
B. Civil proceedings brought by the second applicant ( PERSON )

CARDINAL . On DATE , ORG ordered the debtor to pay the second applicant specified amounts on account of salary arrears and social insurance contributions , plus the costs of the civil proceedings . This judgment became final on DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE , upon the second applicant ’s request to that effect , ORG ordered the enforcement of the said judgment and further ordered the debtor to pay the second applicant the enforcement costs .
C. Civil proceedings brought by the third applicant ( PERSON )
CARDINAL . On DATE , ORG ordered the debtor to pay the third applicant specified amounts on account of salary arrears , plus the costs of the civil proceedings . This judgment became final on DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE , upon the third applicant ’s request to that effect , ORG ordered the enforcement of the said judgment and further ordered the debtor to pay the third applicant the enforcement costs .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ordered the restructuring of the debtor .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG opened insolvency proceedings in respect of the debtor .
CARDINAL . The applicants duly reported their respective claims based on the above - mentioned judgments to the insolvency administration .
CARDINAL . The insolvency proceedings are still ongoing .
